option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: * Added a textview widget with custom typefaces to the TextViewActivity.java * Created a corresponding layout files and string constants

MESSAGE.value: * Modified the main.xml to use a combination of scroll and linear layouts to add demo buttons * Added a new ButtonActivity to demo the button click functionality and added a home button to retrn to the main activity * Added the activities to the manifest file. * Added logic to programatically launch the ButtonActivity intent in the MyActivity * Ignored the local.properties file from VCS
* Added a textview widget with custom typefaces to the TextViewActivity.java * Created a corresponding layout files and string constants
